Package bea.jolt.pool.servlet

Class Summary
ServletDataSet This class contains data elements that represent the input and output parameters of a BEA Tuxedo service.
ServletPoolManagerConfig This class is the startup class for a Jolt Session Pool Manager and one or more associated Jolt Session Pools.
ServletResult This class provides methods to retrieve each field in a ServletResult object as a String.
ServletSessionPool This class provides a session pool for use in a Java servlet.
ServletSessionPoolManager This class is a servlet-specific session pool manager.
